channel.title: Comments on: Grooveshark 2.0 Keeps Getting Better

item.title: By: IQTech
item.dc:creator: IQTech
item.description: I used to love Grooveshark VIP - until I had a system crash and lost my password. The password reset tool does not work and Grooveshark customer service is not responding to requests for help.
item.content:encoded: I used to love Grooveshark VIP – until I had a system crash and lost my password. The password reset tool does not work and Grooveshark customer service is not responding to requests for help.

item.title: By: tina
item.dc:creator: tina
item.description: I LOVE grooveshark...that's too bad that I can't download these GOOD songs onto my itunes.
item.content:encoded: I LOVE grooveshark…that’s too bad that I can’t download these GOOD songs onto my itunes.

item.title: By: Russell Heimlich
item.dc:creator: Russell Heimlich
item.description: Yea the VIPs get to use the 2.0 interface before everyone else. I'm happy to fork over $30 a year for on demand streaming. This service is great!
item.content:encoded: Yea the VIPs get to use the 2.0 interface before everyone else. I’m happy to fork over $30 a year for on demand streaming. This service is great!

item.title: By: lazysupper
item.dc:creator: lazysupper
item.description: sweet. i love Grooveshark. but the 2.0 is only for VIPs. :( what are they doing, getting a revenue model??!! :P
item.content:encoded:
sweet. i love Grooveshark.
but the 2.0 is only for VIPs.
what are they doing, getting a revenue model??!! ðŸ˜›
